alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 2:34AM PDT until April 04 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING NEAR BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible, but should remain rather isolated. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
